pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Mens Energising Face Mask Sheet
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A Potent anti-aging serum-soaked sheet mask formulated specifically for men’s skin. Targets fine lines, wrinkles, loss of elasticity and firmness. Skin appears more supple and youthful.

Warnings

To ensure skin compatibility, it is advisable to test a small area of the skin before use. Use the mask immediately after opening to prevent essence from drying out.

Ingredients

Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated
Castor Oil, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Hamamelis Virginiana
(Witch Hazel) Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate,
Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycine Soja
(Soybean) Seed Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Hydrogenated
Lecithin, Polysorbate 80, Ubiquinone, Parfum/Fragrance.

Directions

BEARD FRIENDLY
The mask is in two pieces.  Unfold and apply the top section over forehead, eyes and nose. Apply the bottom section over mouth and chin.
The bottom section can be applied over beards.
